item.title: The best laid plans…

description.p: All of us know exactly what we could do better and if we still can’t fix it, then it’s time to learn to live with it.

If after pushing yourself the best you can, you find that what you do is all you can do, then it’s time to recognize that as a limit. This is the extent of your productivity and the needle isn’t moving in a hurry.
Just make it a point to acknowledge that you’ve reached that limit, and now you are going to enjoy your time guilt-free doing whatever you want.
Try it and you’ll find that this one little change will make you more productive.

People work the best when they feel like working from within. Sure, pressure can give you a short-burst of adrenaline and help you deliver inhuman performance now and then but that’s not a consistent plan.
